name: PurView Hackers
oneLiner: An app which helps the SAVH to  board buses conveniently by helping them know the bus stop and bus timings

name: COLOURme
oneLiner: An app designed to help make clothing colour identification and matching more accessible to the colour blind.

name: Underpromise
oneLiner: Our app aims to assist the blind to walk in straight lines on the road

name: Aural Delicacy
oneLiner: App that aims to help blind and visually impaired browse menu independently and conveniently when dining in. Volunteers can help take photos of menus and upload them onto our database. We will use text recognition to extract item name, description and cost, and use computer vision to categorise them.

name: WTH
oneLiner: An app which uses the iPhone camera to inform our visually impaired users on the type of crossing ahead and assists them in determining if it is safe to cross

name: WADILO
oneLiner: what's up? Just a guided vision for the visually handicapped folks
